input.sentences: we got to the house to pack the things away .
the treadmill was one of the heavier items .
we trudged over and put the objects into the truck .
even with four men | some of the objects were hard to carry .
as we left | we realized the fence needed a bit of mending next time we come out .
output.sentences: They are packing up their belongings to move to a new home.
The treadmill was too heavy for one man.
The four men carried the treadmill to the truck.
The treadmill was very hard to carry.
At this point he realized how he would miss this home.
